OrgName.entry: FITNESS CLASSES - PONDS FORGE INTERNATIONAL SPORTS CENTRE

Desc.entry: Get fit with like minded individuals in the new group fitness and dedicated spinning studios, at any of the classes we have on offer. Studios have semi-sprung floors and air conditioning. Offers the opportunity to lose weight, tone up and increase flexibility and fitness. Offer the largest group fitness class timetable in the city and there is something on offer for everybody regardless of age and ability. Classes include bodyattack, bodypump, bodybalance, RPM, step, aerobics, spinning, aqua aerobics, fit ball and more. There are low impact classes in the Active Lifestyle programme suitable for older people and GP referral patients and women only sessions.

DisabledAccess.entry: Lift. Changing Places Toilet available in this building.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 6.30am-10.30pm, Fri 6.30am-10pm, Sat & Sun 8am-9.45pm (opening times), please contact for details or see website for more information
